text: He imanadaragana! Yabaradasti kare [1] naridera uttaradhikara ha'oya tomadera jan'ya baidha naya. Tomara taderake ya diyecha ta theke kichu atmasat karara uddesye taderake abarud'dha kare rekho na, yadi na tara spasta kharapa acarana kare [2].
